head.b:skin: // body{color:$(body.text.color);padding:0 $(content.shadow.spread) $(content.shadow.spread)}$(body.background.override) html body $(page.width.selector){min-width:0;max-width:100%;width:$(page.width)}h2{font-size:22px}a:link,a:visited{text-decoration:none}a:hover{color:$(link.hover.color)}.Header h1,.Header h1 a{color:$(header.text.color)}.body-fauxcolumn-outer .fauxcolumn-inner{background:top left}.body-fauxcolumn-outer .cap-top{position:absolute;z-index:1;height:400px;width:100%}#comments h4,.comments .comment-header,.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .comment,.post-body{position:relative}.body-fauxcolumn-outer .cap-top .cap-left{width:100%;background:top left repeat-x}.content-outer{-moz-box-shadow:0 0 $(content.shadow.spread) rgba(0,0,0,.15);-webkit-box-shadow:0 0 $(content.shadow.spread.webkit) rgba(0,0,0,.15);-goog-ms-box-shadow:0 0 $(content.shadow.spread.ie) #1f2e40;box-shadow:0 0 $(content.shadow.spread) rgba(0,0,0,.15);margin-bottom:1px}.content-inner{padding:$(content.padding) $(content.padding.horizontal)}$(content.background.color.selector),.mobile .footer-inner,.mobile .main-inner{background-color:$(content.background.color)}.header-outer{background:0 -400px repeat-x}.Header h1{text-shadow:$(header.shadow.offset.left) $(header.shadow.offset.top) $(header.shadow.spread) rgba(0,0,0,.2)}.Header .description{font-size:$(description.text.size);color:$(description.text.color)}.header-inner .Header .titlewrapper{padding:22px $(header.padding)}.header-inner .Header .descriptionwrapper{padding:0 $(header.padding)}.main-outer,.tabs-inner .section:first-child{border-top:solid}.tabs-inner .section:first-child ul{margin-top:-$(header.border.size);border-top:solid;border-left:solid;border-right:solid}.tabs-inner .widget ul{background:0 -800px repeat-x;border-bottom:solid;margin-top:$(tabs.margin.top);margin-left:-$(tabs.margin.side);margin-right:-$(tabs.margin.side)}.tabs-inner .widget li a{display:inline-block;padding:.6em 1em;color:$(tabs.text.color)}.tabs-inner .widget li a:hover,.tabs-inner .widget li.selected a{color:$(tabs.selected.text.color);background-color:$(tabs.selected.background.color);text-decoration:none}.fauxcolumn-left-outer .fauxcolumn-inner{border-right:1px solid}.fauxcolumn-right-outer .fauxcolumn-inner{border-left:1px solid}div.widget h2.title,div.widget>h2{margin:0 0 1em;color:$(widget.title.text.color)}.widget .zippy{color:$(widget.alternate.text.color);text-shadow:2px 2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.widget .popular-posts ul{list-style:none}.date-header span{background-color:$(date.header.background.color);color:$(date.header.color);padding:$(date.header.padding);letter-spacing:$(date.header.letterspacing);margin:$(date.header.margin)}.main-inner{padding-top:$(main.padding.top);padding-bottom:$(main.padding.bottom)}.main-inner .column-center-inner{padding:0 $(main.padding)}.main-inner .column-center-inner .section{margin:0 $(main.section.margin)}.post{margin:0 0 $(post.margin.bottom)}.comments h4,h3.post-title{margin:.75em 0 0}.post-body{font-size:110%;line-height:1.4}.post-footer,.post-header{line-height:1.6;font-size:90%}.BlogList .item-thumbnail img,.Image img,.Profile img,.post-body .tr-caption-container,.post-body img{padding:$(image.border.small.size)}.post-body .tr-caption-container,.post-body img{padding:$(image.border.large.size)}.post-body .tr-caption-container{color:$(image.text.color)}.post-body .tr-caption-container img{padding:0;background:0 0;border:none;-moz-box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1);-webkit-box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1);box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(0,0,0,.1)}.post-header{margin:0 0 1.5em}.post-footer{margin:20px -2px 0;padding:5px 10px;color:$(post.footer.text.color);background-color:$(post.footer.background.color);border-bottom:1px solid}#comments .comment-author{padding-top:1.5em;border-top:1px solid;background-position:0 1.5em}#comments .comment-author:first-child{padding-top:0;border-top:none}.avatar-image-container{margin:.2em 0 0}#comments{z-index:0!important}.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author{background-repeat:no-repeat}.comments .comments-content .loadmore a{border-top:1px solid;border-bottom:1px solid}.blog-pager-newer-link,.blog-pager-older-link,.home-link{background-color:$(content.background.color);padding:5px}.footer-outer{border-top:dashed #bbb}body.mobile{background-size:$(mobile.background.size)}.mobile .body-fauxcolumn-outer .cap-top{background-size:100% auto}.mobile .content-outer{-webkit-box-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(0,0,0,.15);box-shadow:0 0 3px rgba(0,0,0,.15)}.mobile .tabs-inner .widget ul{margin-left:0;margin-right:0}.mobile .main-inner .column-center-inner .section,.mobile .post,.mobile h3.post-title{margin:0}.mobile .date-header span{padding:.1em 10px;margin:0 -10px}.mobile .blog-pager{background:top center no-repeat}.mobile .footer-outer,.mobile .tabs-inner .section:first-child{border-top:none}.mobile-index-contents{color:$(body.text.color)}.mobile-link-button{background-color:$(link.color)}.mobile-link-button a:link,.mobile-link-button a:visited{color:$(mobile.button.color)}.mobile .tabs-inner .PageList .widget-content{background-color:$(tabs.selected.background.color);color:$(tabs.selected.text.color);border-top:solid;border-bottom:solid}#comments h4{display:inline;padding:9px;line-height:40px}#comments h4,.comments .continue a{background:#ecf0f6;border-radius:6px;font-weight:400;color:#687281}#comments h4,.comments .continue a,.comments .user a{font-size:16px}#comments h4:after{content:"";position:absolute;bottom:-9px;left:9px;border-top:9px solid #ecf0f6;border-right:20px solid transparent;width:0;height:0;line-height:0}#comments .avatar-image-container img{border:0}.comment-thread{color:#111}.comment-thread a{color:#777}.comment-thread ol{margin:0 0 20px}.comment-thread .comment-content a,.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .user a,.comments .user a{color:#ecf0f6}.comments .avatar-image-container,.comments .avatar-image-container img{width:48px;max-width:48px;height:48px;max-height:48px}.comments .comment-block,.comments .comment-replybox-single,.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-left:60px}.comments .comment-block,.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .comment{border:1px solid #ecf0f6;background:#ecf0f6;padding:9px;border-radius:6px}.comments .comments-content .comment{margin:15px 0 0;padding:0;width:100%;line-height:1em}.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author{position:absolute;top:-12px;right:-12px;margin:0;background-image:url(https://www.techprevue.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/red-author.png);width:36px;height:36px}.comments .comments-content .inline-thread{padding:0 0 0 20px}.comments .comments-content .comment-replies{margin-top:0}.comments .comment-content{padding:5px 0;line-height:1.4em}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread{background-color:$(post.footer.background.color);border-left:2px solid #1f2e40;background:0 0}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .comment{width:auto}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .comment:after{content:"";position:absolute;top:9px;left:-20px;border-top:1px solid #ecf0f6;width:9px;height:0}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .comment .comment-block{border:0;background:0 0;padding:0}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .comment-block{margin-left:48px}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .user a{font-size:13px}.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .avatar-image-container,.comments .comment-thread.inline-thread .avatar-image-container img{width:36px;max-width:36px;height:36px;max-height:36px}.comments .continue{border-top:0;width:100%}.comments .continue a{padding:9px 0;text-align:center}.comment .continue{display:none}#comment-editor{width:100%!important}.comment-form{width:100%;max-width:100%}ol#top-ra{max-height:200px;overflow-y:scroll}.comment-footer,.widget{margin:0!important}#commentBodyField,textarea#commentBodyField{background-color:#ecf0f6!important;border:0 solid #ecf0f6!important;box-sizing:border-box;color:#656565!important;display:inline-block;font-size:15px!important;padding:6px!important;border-radius:3px!important;vertical-align:top;width:100%;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-border-radius:1px;-webkit-appearance:none}.btn-mega{border-radius:99px!important;width:36px!important;height:36px!important;font-weight:700}
head.script: (function() {function signalGooglefcPresent() {if (!window.frames['googlefcPresent']) {if (document.body) {const iframe = document.createElement('iframe'); iframe.style = 'width: 0; height: 0; border: none; z-index: -1000; left: -1000px; top: -1000px;'; iframe.style.display = 'none'; iframe.name = 'googlefcPresent'; document.body.appendChild(iframe);} else {setTimeout(signalGooglefcPresent, 0);}}}signalGooglefcPresent();})();

nav.class: topnav navbar navbar-expand border-bottom navbar-light bg-light fixed-top mb-3

button.class: btn btn-icon btn-transparent-dark order-1 order-lg-0 mr-lg-2 ml-2 d-noned-md-inline

li.class: nav-item dropdown no-caret mr-3 d-none d-md-block

div.class: dropdown-menu dropdown-menu-right py-0 o-hidden mr-n15 mr-lg-0 animated--fade-in-up

li.class: d-none nav-item dropdown no-caret mr-2 ml-2 dropdown-notifications d-noned-md-block
nav-item dropdown no-caret mr-2 ml-2 dropdown-user d-none d-md-block000

a.class: btn btn-icon btn-transparent-dark dropdown-toggle avatar avatar-online

b:widget.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and data:posts any (p => p.id != data:view.postId)
b:widget.title: Trends this week

b:if.script: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

div.class: col-lg-12 col-12 post hentry uncustomized-post-template my-3

textarea.name: email-message
textarea.onblur: if (this.value == "") {this.value = "Report an issue or send feedback..";}
textarea.onfocus: if (this.value == "Report an issue or send feedback..") {this.value = "";}
textarea.placeholder: Report an issue or send feedback..
textarea.value: Report an issue or send feedback..

div.label: Be specific while asking a question to another person.
We need to add the author of each post.
Include all the information someone would need to answer your question.

textarea.name: email-message
textarea.onblur: if (this.value == "") {this.value = "Include all the information someone would need to answer your question.";}
textarea.onfocus: if (this.value == "Include all the information someone would need to answer your question.") {this.value = "";}
textarea.placeholder: Include all the information someone would need to answer your question.
textarea.value: Include all the information someone would need to answer your question.

b:include.data: { image: data:image, altText: data:blog.title.escaped, originalWidth: data:width, originalHeight: data:height }
b:include.name: responsiveImage
